attributes.action: immediately implament plans to create green energy for the people of Britain, thus stemming our dependance on high priced fuels and slowly but positively rejuvinate the environment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Just because Britain is facing surmounting money problems doesn't mean other global worries have gone away. Supporting this campaign means having cleaner energy which is less damaging to both our enviroment, and eventually less damaging to our pockets. Perhaps Britain teach the world a lesson by doing so too.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
